reg_pit.acttitle: E-Health (Personal Health Information Access and Protection of Privacy) Act
reg_pit.title: E-Health Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 225/2016, effective September 20, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Owners of diagnostic facilities that are

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: approved under section 33 of the Medicare Protection Act, and
principally equipped for diagnostic services, studies, or procedures in relation to laboratory medicine

bcl:section.bcl:text: are prescribed for the purposes of section 6Â [requests for information by authorized persons] of the Act.

change.changenote: Section 3 was enacted by BC Reg 94/2017 effective March 7, 2017.
Section 3 BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 201/2022 effective October 11, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The BC Clinical and Support Services Society is a prescribed body for the purposes of section 19 (1) (c) (viii) [information-sharing agreements required for disclosure] of the Act.
